channel.title: Auto Attacking & Mining Bug
channel.description:
First off I wanna say hi. I got a problem with my client that auto attacking doesnt work. Heres a screenie: [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/ngbzlz.png[/img]
2nd thing is While I mine elemental ore it doesn't mine it stays the same no movement, nothing. Screenie: [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/zx1zci.png[/img]
Help please, B2300 T4nk

Lin, its a client. But didnt know its allstar.

item.title: Auto Attacking & Mining Bug
item.dc:creator: @Hexyl Hexyl
item.description:
@Hexyl wrote:

lin lmfao, no dont do that, u shud try keeping your process as clean as possible, write a class for it and load it using actuall timers to check.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Attacking & Mining Bug
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Why is this here? It’s neither a client hack nor a client problem… This is server-sided…

Try changing “emoteId” or use the setAnimation method in client.java. For attack back, in the process boolean in client.java, check if you’re under attack and not attacking back. If you aren’t, then set your enemy’s attack id to the one who’s attacking you.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Lewpscape Lewpscape
item.description:
@Lewpscape wrote:

I’m using allstar also, and the elemental ore problem. I don’t think those are the ones that give the mining stuff that you are thinking about, the ones that do it on allstar are located in shilo village.

Read full topic
